name: Joint Defense
description:
OBJECTIVE:

     Survive as many waves of Enemies as possible before they destory The City

ACTIVE ABILITIES: 

     Place Turrets (left click)

     Pick up Turrets (right click)

PASSIVE ABILITIES:

     Repair Turrets over time while attached

     Autofire attached Turrets

GAMEPLAY:

     If Turrets drop to zero health they are destroyed

     Collect new Turrets from The City when the ! icon is shown
